Great quality, great workmanship, easy scheduling, hassle free transaction. Installation done all in one day. Evorich staffs‚Äô worked with great professionalism, helped with moving and very careful with handling as well. Made sure space is cleaned before installation work carried out.

Shout out to Cindy for the great friendly service and advice provided. Greatly appreciated and highly recommended.

Evorich flooring was recommended to us by a family member who engaged them for his home.
Owen Ng who attended to us was friendly and attentive. He assured us the quality of this flooring and the workmanship.
Work done and the quality of their workmanship was exceptional and the final product was beyond our expectation. We‚Äôre happy and enjoy our new flooring.
We highly recommend them to anyone looking for fast and hassle free new flooringüëç

Engaging Evorich was 1 of the best renovation decision we made. We decided to get the vinyl package from them separately. From day 1, Owen engaged with us and explained everything well. Followed up what needs to be done prior to installation. Despite our changes here and there Owen was very patient and was accommodating to our request. When the vinyls were installed, at first glance we fall in love with our whole house flooring and we were so happy.
Thank you Owen and Evorich.
very professional installation done by owen and teams for my living room, kitchen and balcony. good workmanship and will recommend to my friends who need any flooring services.

Grateful to Evorich for the trustworthiness, reliability and the super customer service. I would like to give special commendation to Louis for his efficiency and professionalism despite the long delay at my end. In a short notice, he managed to make arrangements to set up my TV console beautifully. Everyone at home was very pleased and even considering buying a bigger TV. I would highly recommend Evorich to be used in your home renovation. It is worth it!
